sentences.english: In this paper a new kind of superhard abrasive with corundum-coating was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種新型的剛玉塗覆的超硬磨料。

sentences.english: Corundum abrasive with bauxite as the main raw material formed at high temperature melting.
sentences.chinese: 棕剛玉磨料以鋁礬土爲主要原料經高溫熔鍊而成。

sentences.english: WC are dispersing well in liquid steel due to its interfacial reaction and wettable with li…
sentences.chinese: 剛玉與鋼液不潤溼，分散不好，且引起顆粒脫落。

sentences.english: With brown, white fused alumina two advantages.
sentences.chinese: 具有棕，白剛玉兩者的優點。

sentences.english: Brown aluminium oxide Brown aluminium oxide is fused and crystallized under high temperature from a mixture of bauxite and other and other raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 棕剛玉是以鋁礬土等爲原料，經高溫熔鍊結晶而成。

sentences.english: Either way, these gems are among the most beautiful of the corundum family.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，粉紅色的剛玉是最迷人美麗的寶石之一。

sentences.english: High carburized rate was attained by using Al 2O 3 fluidized bed furnace.
sentences.chinese: 剛玉流動粒子爐滲碳能夠獲得較高的滲碳速度。

sentences.english: Recycling technology of aluminosilicate and corundum refractory waste to prepare high value ceramic grinding media was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究硅酸鋁及剛玉質耐火材料廢料的再生利用技術。

sentences.english: Brown aluminium oxide is fused and crystallized under high temperature from a mixture of bauxite and other and other raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 棕剛玉是以鋁礬土等爲原料，經高溫熔鍊結晶而成。

sentences.english: The main material of brown fused alumina is bauxite, which is electrically fused in high temperature.
sentences.chinese: 棕剛玉是以鋁礬土爲主要原料，經高溫熔鍊而成。

sentences.english: Corundum may be the typical secondary minerals in the high-alumina fly ash.
sentences.chinese: 剛玉可能是高鋁粉煤灰中典型的次生礦物。

sentences.english: Relating to or designating corundum that resembles another stone in color.
sentences.chinese: 關於或表示在顏色上類似另一塊石頭的剛玉的。

sentences.english: In addition, there are some special species, such as abrasives, such as sintered corundum.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還有一些特殊品種，如燒結剛玉磨具等。

definition: citrine (orange or yellow quartz SiO2 as a semiprecious stone)
